Name: Early closure or withdrawal of research sites
PICs - Addition of Participant Identification Centres undertaking the same activities as existing PICs
PICs - Early closure or withdrawal of Participant Identification Centres
Addition of sites undertaking the same activities as existing sites
CRF/other study data records - Changes in the documentation used by the research team for recording study data
GDPR wording - Accepted wording used verbatim
Other minor change to study documents (e.g. information sheets, consent forms, questionnaires, letters) that will have additional resource implications for participating organisations
Post trial information for participants (which does not contradict the protocol)
Protocol - Non-substantial changes (e.g. not affecting safety or the scientific value of the trial)
Translations - Addition of translated versions of participant-facing documentation
